评论详情: I wanted a pair of good quality jeans that looked aesthetically pleasing and was a simple and CONVENIENT purchase online from Amazon. When the pants arrived I IMMEDIATELY fell in love! The quality was perfect. It’s 90% denim so ALWAYS DO YOUR RESEARCH before purchasing… I thought the quality was going to be like all the other clothes I purchase.. aka: bathing suit material, and 100% spandex.. but I was shocked, totally worth the $35  The pants could go with literally anything I wore. And they actually have FUNCTIONAL pockets… everything about these pants are astonishing. They are my new favorite pants. Highly recommend purchasing!
